name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene BLOCKER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene BLOCKER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Dennis J. Cogan, Philadelphia, (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Eric Beller, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 743
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene BLOCKER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 22, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Dennis J. Cogan, Philadelphia, (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Eric Beller, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
